# isAnalog

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the input provides analog values.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAnalog: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] for most axis inputs.

## Getting the characteristics

- **canWrap**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the value wraps when it reaches the range’s minimum or maximum value.
